item.title: Object spawns?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

ok so lets say i wana spawn a law alter i add it in i compile and then it spawns in the right place but when i go and walk around ill see it in a diffrent place and more and more places?

same with deleting objects
ill delet it but after i compile and log on itll still be there i checked the cords and they were right i tele and come back and there gone?
ill tele again and come back and there back again?

how am i able to fix this its getting really anoying

heres my make object void

[code]public void MakeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)
{
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(y - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(x - (mapRegionX * 8));

outStream.createFrame(151);
//outStream.writeByteA(((x&7) << 4) + (y&7));
outStream.writeByteA(0);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(typeID);
outStream.writeByteS((tileObjectType<<2) +(orientation&3));
}
[/code]

Read full topic
